instructions: Tap the Phone app. Tap Favorites . Tap Edit . A red circle icon with a minus sign appears next to each favorite in the list. Tap the red icon next to the Favorite you want to delete. Tap the Delete button that appears to the right of the contact to remove the favorite. The newly updated Favorites list displays.

Tap the Phone app to launch it. Tap Favorites . Tap Edit . Tap and hold the three-line icon so that the favorite hovers above the rest of the list. On an iPhone with 3D Touch, if you press too hard a shortcut menu appears. Drag the contact to a different position in the Favorites list. When your Favorites are arranged the way you want, tap Done to save the new order.
